trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Napa
There were no other sightings in Napa on or around October 15th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my patio having a cigarette.It was just getting dark,the stars were visible.I noticed what I thought was a shooting star,but it did not move.It was bright white but was not glowing.It seemed to change shape a little.I thought it could be a plane but there were no blinking lights.It was very clear to me for about 30 seconds.I was in awe of it.Then it just fizzled out.Could someone please tell me what i saw?
Summary: Really bright white image but very clear..not fuzzy
Object Shape: Circle, Diamond, Disc, Flash, Oval, Sphere
